name: Unhandled::Exception
description:
A super short experience for the GameOff GameJam. 

This is my first game jam game. In fact, it's my first game ever O.o (I'm sure you can tell). I always start projects and never finish them. I guess it's true what they say about having deadlines  :)

Game Controls:

ActionGamepadKeyboardMoveLeft JoysticArrow KeysAttackX (West)Space bar

The entire project can be found here: https://github.com/tuto1902/GameOff_BUG
